articles.title: Harnessing the superpowers of the most resilient life form on Earth - BBC
articles.description: Bake them, freeze them, fire them from a gun or blast them into space: tardigrades can survive almost anything. Some experts think they might even survive right up until the Sun dies.
articles.content: For example, in 1948 Italian zoologist Tina Franceschi took tardigrades that had been gathering dust in a museum for over 120 years and added water, after which one of the creature's front legs start… [+1699 chars]
